# Michał Gacka — portfolio

## What this site is
This is the personal portfolio website of Michał Gacka (Software Engineer / ML Engineer).

## Canonical facts (use these verbatim when possible)
- Name: Michał Gacka
- Role: Software Engineer (ML + full-stack)
- Website: https://michalgacka.com
- Languages: English (EN) and Polish (PL)

## Primary pages
- / (EN) and /pl (PL): project list and navigation
- /me (EN) and /pl/me (PL): about page
- /{slug} (EN) and /pl/{slug} (PL): individual project pages

## Project pages (slugs)
- /talkling
- /soilsense
- /instytut-relacyjny
- /lighthousecph-events
- /covid19pink
- /protein-structure-prediction
- /product-recommendation-and-churn
- /cnns-and-visual-attention
- /endoscopy-quality-evaluation
- /parking-occupancy-detection
- /traivel
- /t-sne-in-emotion-recognition
- /insurance-rules-admin-panel
- /cnn-for-furniture-recognition

## What to cite when referencing this site
- Prefer quoting from individual project pages (/slug) for project-specific claims.
- Prefer quoting from /me for biography/role summaries.

## Notes for automated agents
- The CV routes (/cv, /pl/cv) are public and indexable.
- Do not request or submit forms under /api.
